title: Game Crash ! Mac's only
body:
So i have been reading the forums for a solution to my League closing when i open it . I saw that mostly Mac's have the same problem . I've tried reinstalling and that didnt work . Plz help me and my fellow Mac users play LoL 

Thank you

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Just so you are aware, I did post an update about this issue, which you can find here:

http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/support/eHL23EKr-crashes-on-opening-the-game?comment=000700000000000000000001

I hope this alleviates some confusion!  I'm sorry I am unable to provide more direct help!  :(
If you use google chrome, make sure it is closed when you are playing LOL. There is a bad interaction between the two which can cause crashes.
